attributes.action: order the british team not to attend the 2008 Olympic Games in China.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having seen people being evicted from their homes to make way for Olympic developments in Beijing I am disgusted, I'm sure that many others share my concerns, Whilst I acknowledge the importance of the games and look forward to the 2012 London games surely we as civilised countries cannot be seen to condone such abuse of Human Rights by competing in the Beijing Games. Please withdraw all british competotors from the games.
